title: Need Help Asap!!
body: I was doing my ranked placements when league closed by itself, and the game crashed and wouldnt let me back in. Is there any way i can redo this placement, or not have 20 min bans for 5 games.

replies.body: I know it sucks but I won't have a way to get that placement back unfortunately =\ . Let's take a little time to diagnose your network to make sure you're able to keep a solid connection through the entire match by working through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
